h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area
h1_content: Black Myth: Wukong is full of secrets, including hidden areas that can only be unlocked through solving a puzzle or finding a key item. One such secret area is in Chapter 1 and requires ringing three bells to access it. On this page, you'll find information on how to find each of the three bells and what awaits you in the hidden temple.
h2_content:
The final bell can be found in the Marsh of the White Mist. After the fight against the Whiteclad Noble, don’t go toward the building that leads to the Black Wind Cave.
Instead, go to the left and through the small cave to find the final bell. It'll be at the end of the path, where a wolf hangs from the nearby tree.
